root.name: Harvest Moon: Animal Parade
root.description: OverviewHarvest Moon: Animal Parade is an exclusive Wii title in the Harvest Moon series of farming simulation games that was developed by Marvelous Entertainment.The game offers an experience that is remarkably similar to Harvest Moon: Tree of Tranquility, not least because the two games share the same character designer, meaning that a similar visual style is present. You are even given the option of electing to play as one of the Tree of Tranquility characters instead of the new ones, if you prefer.
